mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food_machine ( id, imei, host, area_code, pos, notice, cat_id, partner_id, status, manager_id, replenish_man, picking_man, maintenance_man,remark, create_time,create_by, update_time, update_by) VALUES ( #{id}, #{imei}, #{host}, #{areaCode}, #{pos}, #{notice}, #{catId}, #{partnerId}, #{status}, #{managerId}, #{replenishMan},#{pickingMan},#{maintenanceMan},#{remark}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy});
mapper.select: SELECT mac_activity.activity_type as activity, mac.name, mac.area_code,mac.IMEI,mac.pos, mac.`status`,mac.id, mac.address FROM food_machine as mac left join food_machine_activity_ref as mac_activity on mac_activity.mac_id = mac.id WHERE mac.id >= ( (SELECT MAX(id) FROM food_machine) - (SELECT MIN(id) FROM food_machine) ) * RAND() + (SELECT MIN(id) FROM food_machine) LIMIT #{size}

select mac_activity.activity_type as activity, mac.name, mac.area_code,mac.IMEI,mac.pos, mac.`status`,mac.id, mac.address
from food_machine as mac left join food_machine_activity_ref as mac_activity on mac_activity.mac_id = mac.id where mac.area_code = #{areaCode}

SELECT mac.id , mac.`name`, mac.IMEI, mac.notice, mac.cat_id, cat.`name` AS cat_name, mac.address FROM food_machine AS mac LEFT JOIN food_machine_product_cat AS cat ON mac.id = cat.mac_id WHERE mac.id = #{macId}

select mac.id AS macId, mac.`name`, mac.IMEI AS macCode, mac.area_code as areaCode, mac.notice, mac.cat_id AS catId, cat.`name` AS catName, mac.address from food_machine_aisle as aisle left join food_product_cat as cat on cat.id = aisle.product_cat_id left join food_machine as mac on mac.id = aisle.mac_id where cat.keyword like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')) or mac.`name` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'));
